questionTitle: The performance was dull. It was ..............
can he drive? He can drive 100 km an hour.
It was mainly for this reason. It was .............. for this reason.
Two girls wrote to .......... every week.
Lend him 100 dollars, please. He's............at the moment.

anwers: I went out when he called yesterday.
I went out when he had called yesterday.
I go out when he called yesterday.
I had gone out when he called yesterday.

questionTitle: Could I ............ for the American Airways flight to London?
Don't disturb Mary, she has .............. down for a rest.
He is a kind man. He isn't reluctant to help the poor. He's ...............

There's not much oil left, but I think there's just ...... to last to the end of the week.
If he ..............enough money, he'd go and live in another country.
She wasn't thirsty ................ she drank some water.
Mark couldn't quite ............. what he was doing because he was so far away.
Unless Bean had had a good ...............he would never have passed his driving test.
